column5: The lake is full! Come stay ON LAKE TRAVIS! Walk out to the deck from your bedroom and go down the steps to fish,swim, & kayak off our private dock. Peace and quiet in the tree tops. Texas best wineries & live music near by. Market, coffee shop, massage, and restaurants, parks, hiking trails, boat rentals and the Oasis near. Use of kitchen and grills. Parking, laundry, fishing poles, free kayak. Sunset charters may be possible for extra fee. Closest Airbnb on Lake Travis to downtown.
column8: ON LAKE TRAVIS, FISH, KAYAK,SWIM & CHILL ON DOCK!
